import './BookCompanion.css'; import { Button } from '../components/Button.js'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import React,{useState} from "react"; import {Multiselect} from 'multiselect-react-dropdown'; function BookCompanion () { const [value,setValue] = useState('') const options = [ {label: "Male",value: 1}, {label: "Female",value: 2}, {label: "Others",value: 3}, ] const options1 = [ {label: "Yes",value: 1}, {label: "No", value: 2}, ] function handleSelect(event){ setValue(event.target.value) } const data = [ {Language: "Arabic",id: 1}, {Language: "Alanian",id: 2}, {Language: "Bengali",id: 3}, {Language: "Bulgarian",id: 4}, {Language: "Catalan",id: 5}, {Language: "Czech",id: 6}, {Language: "Dutch",id: 7}, {Language: "English",id: 8}, {Language: "Finnish",id: 9}, {Language: "French",id: 10}, {Language: "German",id: 11}, {Language: "Greek",id: 12}, {Language: "Hindi",id: 13}, {Language: "Hungarian",id: 14}, {Language: "Italian",id: 15}, {Language: "Japanese",id: 16}, {Language: "Korean",id: 17}, {Language: "Latin",id: 18}, {Language: "Marathi",id: 19}, {Language: "Malayalam",id: 20}, {Language: "Nepali",id: 21}, {Language: "Norwegian",id: 22}, {Language: "Oriya",id: 23}, {Language: "Polish",id: 24}, {Language: "Portugese",id: 25}, {Language: "Punjabi",id: 26}, {Language: "Romanian",id: 27}, {Language: "Russian",id: 28}, {Language: "Spanish",id: 29}, {Language: "Sanskrit",id: 30}, {Language: "Tamil",id: 31}, {Language: "Thai",id: 32}, {Language: "Turkish",id: 33}, {Language: "Ukrainian",id: 34}, {Language: "Urdu",id: 35}, {Language: "Vietnamese",id: 36}, {Language: "Zulu",id: 37}, ] const [option2] = useState(data); return (

); } export default BookCompanion;
